name: Naiko's Room (DEMO)
description:
"Wake up, water the plant, stare into the clock, read a book, go to sleep, repeat."

-----

Naiko's Room is a RPG Maker pshychological horror game mainly focused on telling a story of isolation, weird books, nightmares, shaky friendships, pills and memories torn apart.

Follow a young, pathetic girl inside a cold and unfamiliar room, as she does her daily routine. That's it, nothing more, nothing less, make a relaxing living with the few things that you can do, and everything will be okay... Let's just hope she can remember her.

-----

Currently this game is a work-in-progress, and only the DEMO is availble. Some things may change in the full release.

The DEMO is 20-30 minutes long and has only 1 ending.

The content warnings are in the game. Please read them, and don't play this game if you find such subjects disturbing or if you're in a bad place mentally. Keep in mind that this is a psychological horror game, and it might go over some serious subjects.

This is my first game made in RPG Maker ;; I am still experimenting with the program and with game making in general. This whole game is kind of a learning experience for me. Hopefully the Full Version will be more polished.

Hope you're not enjoying your stay inside Naiko's Room!
